# Platform Package

The platform package provides cross-cutting concerns and utilities used across all applications in the monorepo.

## Modules

- `routing/` - Navigation and routing utilities
- `navigation/` - Navigation state management and helpers
- `theming/` - Theme context and utilities
- `responsive/` - Responsive design hooks and utilities
- `storage/` - Local and session storage utilities
- `analytics/` - Analytics tracking (stubbed by default)
- `error-boundary/` - Error boundary component
- `telemetry/` - Telemetry utilities (stubbed by default)

## Usage

```ts
import { useTheme } from '@repo/platform/theming';
import { useResponsive } from '@repo/platform/responsive';
import { localStorageUtil } from '@repo/platform/storage';
```
